name: Warri Cultural Heritage Center
description: Experience the rich traditions of the Itsekiri, Urhobo, and Ijaw peoples through vibrant cultural performances, traditional art exhibits, and historical artifacts. This center celebrates the diverse heritage of the Niger Delta region.

name: Warri River Waterfront
description: A scenic waterfront destination offering breathtaking views of the Warri River. Perfect for evening strolls, boat rides, and experiencing the serene beauty of Delta State's natural waterways and riverside communities.

name: Effurun Shopping Plaza
description: The premier shopping destination in Warri featuring modern retail stores, local markets, restaurants, and entertainment facilities. A bustling hub where traditional markets meet contemporary commerce.

name: Igbudu Market
description: A vibrant covered marketplace offering fresh produce, colorful textiles, traditional fabrics, and local crafts. Experience authentic Warri commerce in this bustling hub where locals shop for everything from vegetables to beautiful African prints.

name: Delta Business District
address: Central Business District, Warri, Delta State
description: The economic powerhouse of Warri showcasing modern office complexes, financial institutions, and corporate headquarters. A testament to the city's growing role as a major commercial center in Nigeria.

name: The River Restaurant & Lounge
description: Fine dining experience featuring contemporary Nigerian cuisine with international influences. Elegant ambiance with traditional African decor, exceptional service, and a menu that celebrates local flavors with a modern twist.

name: Golden Gate Hotel & Suites
description: Luxury accommodation offering world-class hospitality in the heart of Warri. Features modern amenities, conference facilities, fine dining, and exceptional service for business and leisure travelers.

name: Warri City Park
address: Park Avenue, GRA, Warri, Delta State
description: A peaceful urban oasis providing green spaces for recreation, exercise, and relaxation. Popular with families, joggers, and anyone seeking a tranquil escape within the city with walking paths and beautiful landscaping.
